title: 너무 무서워...
content: I watched very scary movie. and I was so scared...
The sun is shining, I aced the test, and my favorite song just came on. What a perfect day.

title: ㄷ3
content: I heard a strange noise outside my window late tonight. My heart is pounding and I can't sleep.
heard the news about the canceled trip. It’s hard to stay optimistic right now.

Reading about that politician’s scandal made me feel truly sick to my stomach. It’s repulsive.
My old best friend, who moved away years ago, showed up at my door. Total shock!
